item.title: Golang latest version
item.description: Golang latest version # Install go1.18beta1 # https://go.dev/doc/tutorial/generics $ go version go version go1.17.2 darwin/amd64 $ go install golang.org/dl/go1.18beta1@latest $ go1.18beta1 download $ vi ~/.bash_profile alias go=go1.18beta1 $ source ~/.bash_profile $ go version go version go1.18beta1 darwin/amd64 Run the following # $ go mod init sample $ go get golang.org/x/exp https://gotipplay.golang.org/p/ifloU6kyjMt package main import ( "fmt" "golang.org/x/exp/maps" "golang.org/x/exp/slices" ) func main() { colors := map[string]string{ "White": "#FFFFFF", "Black": "#000000", "Blue": "#0000FF", "Red": "#FF0000", "Green": "#00FF00", } fmt.
